lines.text: Her father called her the Little Sportsman.
You're from Cartiers and I'm from Woolworths.
All God's chillun' got wings and I'm one of God's chillum.' Maybe only a stepchild.
A lot of people figure riding a plane's for fun, kind of like a roller-coaster, just for a thrill.
Aren't women entitled to a thrill?
If we go out some evening you'll see more of my shoulders than I see of yours.
Apparently people are too interested in buying into wildcat oil stock and gold to buy anything real.
Are you asking me because you came last night, and are here this morning?
